info.name: Workoutify API
info.description: Backend API for Workoutify: users, sleep, workouts, exercises, meals, foods, summaries, PRs, and muscle balance.

request.description: Idempotent login endpoint. If user with given email exists, returns it. Otherwise creates a new user.
Returns sleep, workouts-per-day, and calories/macros per day for the last N days.
For every exercise, returns the max weight lifted by this user. If the user has never done an exercise, its PR is 0.
For each week and primary muscle group, returns total volume (sum of reps * weight) over the last N weeks.

item.name: List all sleep for a user
List all workouts for a user
List all meals for a user
